text: Robert Ludlum (May 25, 1927 - March 12, 2001) was an American writer. He is best known as the author of The Bourne Identity from 1980, which was made into a movie in 2001. == Other websites == * Official website of Robert Ludlum * Category:1927 births Category:2001 deaths Category:Writers from New York City
title: Robert Ludlum
